description:
This episode’s special guest is the beast hunter Imoto Ayako. The Akudarma trio travel to the Amazon in 2028 and immediately locate her. She apparently is on the hunt for a monkey with a pretty jewel on its forehead. That jewel ends up being the Dynamond. Imoto tells them that as she started taking girly trips alone on her days off, she started losing her wildness. Which team can help her regain her wildness and take the Dynamond?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Imoto Is a Historical Figure?! What`s the Super Surprising Problem That the Beast Hunter Imoto Ayako Has?!
Imoto ga Ijin!? Chinjuu Hunter Imoto Ayako no Bikkuri Dokkuri na Nayami to wa!?
イモトが偉人!? 珍獣ハンターイモトアヤコのビックリドッキリな悩みとは!?
